column4: Apparently this problem has occured before.  USB keyboard works fine and one day stops working in Grub but works fine in ubuntu and in bios.
check the usb-legacy settings in the bios. Ive seen that issue befor on some machines
lose the attitude a little bit.  the cd is being asked for because its in your 'sources' remove the cd from the sources,, and it will grab the files off the internet.
i do belive there has been some updates to samba since  the official release.   so you will want to get it from the internet anyway
